TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FreeformActivityDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供可自訂的活動設計工具介面，讓使用者能以視覺方式在工作流程設計介面上進行修改。

span.span: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 可讓使用者修改活動在工作流程設計介面上的顯示方式。The allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface. 當使用 屬性讓 `Designer` 與自訂活動類別產生關聯時，自訂活動的外觀會在使用者將自訂活動拖放到設計介面上時變得與其他活動不同。When you associate with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface. 一旦 在設計工具介面上顯示活動時，使用者就可以繪製通往其他活動設計工具的接點，並使用設計介面中定義的參數來調整設計工具的大小。Once displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface. > [!NOTE] > 使用者只能將接點加入至自訂活動，因為 是與工作流程中最上層活動相關聯。Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.

summary.span: 取得協助工具應用程式用來為殘障使用者調整應用程式 UI 的 。

span.span: Gets an that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
The associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前沒有為控制項指定 `AccessibleObject`，則會建立其新的執行個體。If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要取得或設定 `AccessibilityObject` 屬性，您必須加入隨 .NET Framework 安裝之 Accessibility 組件的參考。To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]可存取物件的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 的＜Active Accessibility＞一節。 accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.

summary.span: 取得或設定界限大小，這個界限會在 自動調整大小時顯示在子設計工具周圍。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the is automatically resized.

value.span: ，表示要顯示在 的子設計工具周圍的界限大小。

span.span: A that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的預設大小為 物件，尺寸為 40 像素乘以 40 像素。The default size of is a object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels. 如果與目前工作流程主題關聯的 屬性是設為 `true`， 設定的高度和寬度都會是格線大小的一半。If the property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size. 當您設定 時，會更新 的配置。When you set , the layout of the is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 設定為 `true` 且 設定為 ， 會在工作流程設計介面上執行所有的調整大小工作。If is set to `true` and is set to , performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface. 如果 設定為 `true` 且 設定為 ， 會執行配置工作，而不會執行調整大小工作。If is set to `true` and is set to , performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks. 如果 設定為 `false`，所有包含的設計工具都會保持其先前在 中的位置。If is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the .
